title: Minecraft Education Edition
description: An alternative version of Minecraft designed for learning in classrooms. Students can explore, build, and collaborate in a safe environment.

title: Lego Builder's Journey
description: A beautiful, calm puzzle game using LEGO blocks to explore and solve challenges. Perfect for relaxation and creative thinking.

title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
description: Create your own island paradise, decorate, and explore a colorful world. Interact with animal neighbors, build, and relax in this stress-free game.

title: Crayola Create and Play
description: A collection of creative activities like coloring, designing, and mini-games. All in one safe learning environment for younger players.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Build your dream farm, raise animals, grow crops, and become part of a charming community. A relaxing and engaging alternative to more intense games.

title: Portal 2
description: A mind-bending puzzle game with a rich story. Use physics-defying portals to solve increasingly complex challenges alone or with a friend.
